The baroncs package is a simple tool to calculate the charge state distribution for a given ion type at different energy levels. The stripping foil is carbon, and the package is based on `this paper`_.

.. _this paper: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/016890029390622O

The baroncs package is found here_.

.. _here: https://github.com/jako4295/baroncs
